name: FloatingPoint
description:
FloatingPoint is an online, 5v5, third person shooter game that can be played on almost any device, anywhere, for free.  FloatingPoint was developed by Samuel Keller and can be seen at the following places:

twitter.com/floatingpnt

playfloatingpoint.com

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCMO4KL7tLCpRVPApAE8EY1Q
